StatTooltip.MaxHP: The character's Maximum HP. When HP reaches 0 they will be defeated and retreat from battle.
StatTooltip.AttackPower: Affects the amount of damage dealt by offensive abilities.
StatTooltip.DefensePower: Affects the amount of damage received from incoming attacks.
StatTooltip.HealPower: Affects the amount of HP restored by healing abilities and damage absorbed by barrier abilities.
StatTooltip.AccuracyPoint: Affects the chance for attacks to hit their target. Chance to hit is guaranteed when greater than the target's Evasion.
StatTooltip.DodgePoint: Affects the chance to evade incoming attacks. Evading only becomes possible when greater than the attacker's Accuracy.
StatTooltip.CriticalPoint: Affects the chance of dealing critical hits. Critical hits normally only become possible when greater than the target's Crit RES.
StatTooltip.CriticalDamageRate: Affects the multiplier applied to damage dealt when the attack critically hits. Reduced by target's Crit DMG RES.
StatTooltip.HealEffectivenessRate: Affects the amount of HP restored by incoming healing abilities. Has no effect on barrier abilities.
StatTooltip.OppressionPower: Affects the chance of inflicting a Crowd Control effect. Also increases the amount of CC gauge filled when using CC abilities on certain enemies.
StatTooltip.OppressionResist: Affects the chance of being inflicted with a Crowd Control effect.
StatTooltip.CriticalChanceResistPoint: Affects the chance of receiving critical hits. Critical hits only become possible when lower than the attacker's Crit.
StatTooltip.CriticalDamageResistRate: Affects the multiplier applied to damage received when an incoming attack critically hits.
StatTooltip.StabilityPoint: Affects the minimum amount of damage dealt by offensive abilities. A higher stability value will result in average damage dealt closer to 100%.
StatTooltip.StabilityRate: Affects the minimum amount of damage dealt by offensive abilities.
StatTooltip.Range: The maximum range of the character's normal attacks.
StatTooltip.AmmoCount: The maximum amount of weapon ammunition. Weapon ammunition is used by the character's normal attacks, and they must reload when this reaches 0.
StatTooltip.MoveSpeed: Affects the speed at which the character can move.
StatTooltip.DamageRatio: Affects the final multiplier applied to damage dealt by offensive abilities.
StatTooltip.DamagedRatio: Affects the final multiplier applied to damage received from incoming attacks.
StatTooltip.AttackSpeed: Affects the speed of normal attacks, reloads and attack delay.
StatTooltip.BlockRate: Affects the base chance to block incoming attacks when taking cover.
StatTooltip.DefensePenetration: Affects the amount of target DEF that is ignored when dealing damage.
StatTooltip.RegenCost: Affects the rate at which the character generates skill cost.
StatTooltip.SightPoint: Affects the maximum range of the character's EX and Basic skills.
StatTooltip.EnhanceExplosionRate: Affects the damage multiplier when dealing Explosive damage against a Light Armor target.
StatTooltip.EnhancePierceRate: Affects the damage multiplier when dealing Piercing damage against a Heavy Armor target.
StatTooltip.EnhanceMysticRate: Affects the damage multiplier when dealing Mystic damage against a Special Armor target.
StatTooltip.EnhanceSonicRate: Affects the damage multiplier when dealing Sonic damage against a Elastic Armor target.
StatTooltip.EnhanceLightArmorRate: Affects the amount of damage received when defense type is Light Armor.
StatTooltip.EnhanceHeavyArmorRate: Affects the amount of damage received when defense type is Heavy Armor.
StatTooltip.EnhanceUnarmedRate: Affects the amount of damage received when defense type is Special Armor.
StatTooltip.EnhanceElasticArmorRate: Affects the amount of damage received when defense type is Elastic Armor.
StatTooltip.ExtendBuffDuration: Affects the duration of buffs granted to self and allies.
StatTooltip.ExtendDebuffDuration: Affects the duration of debuffs inflicted on enemies.
StatTooltip.ExtendCrowdControlDuration: Affects the duration of CC effects inflicted on enemies.

BuffTooltip.Buff_AidAttitude: 以一定时间间隔持续回复生命值
BuffTooltip.Buff_AmmoCount: 增加武器普通攻击的载弹量
BuffTooltip.Buff_AttackSpeed: 提升普通攻击与换弹的速度，并缩短开火间隔
BuffTooltip.Buff_BlockRate: 提升处于掩体掩护状态时掩体阻挡攻击的概率
BuffTooltip.Buff_ConcentratedTarget: 成为敌方优先攻击的目标
BuffTooltip.Buff_CostChange: 降低使用EX技能所需的技能COST
BuffTooltip.Buff_CriticalChance: 提升攻击时的暴击概率
BuffTooltip.Buff_CriticalChanceResistPoint: 降低受到攻击时暴击的概率
BuffTooltip.Buff_DamagedLimit: 限制受到攻击时的最大伤害
BuffTooltip.Buff_DamagedRatio: 以一定倍率降低受到的所有伤害
BuffTooltip.Buff_DamageRatio: 以一定倍率提升攻击造成的所有伤害
BuffTooltip.Buff_DotHeal: 以一定时间间隔持续回复生命值
BuffTooltip.Buff_EnhanceExplosionRate: 提升爆破伤害对轻型护甲单位攻击时的伤害倍率
BuffTooltip.Buff_EnhancePierceRate: 提升贯通伤害对重型装甲单位攻击时的伤害倍率
BuffTooltip.Buff_EnhanceMysticRate: 提升神秘伤害对特种装甲单位攻击时的伤害倍率
BuffTooltip.Buff_EnhanceSonicRate: Increases the damage bonus when dealing Sonic type attacks against Elastic Armor targets.
BuffTooltip.Buff_EnhanceLightArmorRate: (暂定)降低护甲类型为轻型护甲时受到的伤害
BuffTooltip.Buff_EnhanceHeavyArmorRate: (暂定)降低护甲类型为重型装甲时受到的伤害
BuffTooltip.Buff_EnhanceUnarmedRate: (暂定)降低护甲类型为特种装甲时受到的伤害
BuffTooltip.Buff_ExtendBuffDuration: 提升赋予我方单位增益状态的持续时间
BuffTooltip.Buff_ExtendDebuffDuration: 提升对敌方单位施加减益状态的持续时间
BuffTooltip.Buff_ExtendCrowdControlDuration: 提升对敌方单位施加群控状态的持续时间
BuffTooltip.Buff_HealByHit_Damaged: 每受到一次攻击回复一定量的生命值
BuffTooltip.Buff_HealEffectiveness: 提升该目标受到回复效果时的生命值回复量
BuffTooltip.Buff_HealPower: 提升回复效果的治疗量与护盾能吸收的伤害量
BuffTooltip.Buff_HIT: 降低攻击被闪避的概率
BuffTooltip.Buff_OppressionPower: 提升成功施加群控状态的概率
BuffTooltip.Buff_OppressionResist: 降低被施加群控状态的概率
BuffTooltip.Buff_Penetration: 提升攻击时无视目标防御力的量
BuffTooltip.Buff_Stability: 提升攻击伤害随机波动区间的下限
BuffTooltip.Debuff_AmmoCount: 降低武器普通攻击的载弹量
BuffTooltip.Debuff_AttackSpeed: 降低普通攻击与换弹的速度，并延长攻击间隔
BuffTooltip.Debuff_BlockRate: 降低处于掩体掩护状态时掩体阻挡攻击的概率
BuffTooltip.Debuff_Burn: 以一定时间间隔受到烧伤伤害(该伤害无法暴击)
BuffTooltip.Debuff_Cheerleading: 以一定时间间隔受到伤害(该伤害无法暴击)
BuffTooltip.Debuff_Chill: 以一定时间间隔受到恶寒伤害(该伤害无法暴击)
BuffTooltip.Debuff_ConcentratedTarget: 成为敌方优先攻击的目标
BuffTooltip.Debuff_CostChange: 提升使用EX技能所需的技能COST
BuffTooltip.Debuff_CriticalChance: 降低攻击时的暴击概率
BuffTooltip.Debuff_CriticalChanceResistPoint: 提升受到攻击时暴击的概率
BuffTooltip.Debuff_DamageByHit_Damaged: 被攻击时将受到追加伤害
BuffTooltip.Debuff_DamagedRatio: 以一定倍率提升受到的所有伤害
BuffTooltip.Debuff_DamageRatio: 以一定倍率降低攻击造成的所有伤害
BuffTooltip.Debuff_EnhanceExplosionRate: 降低爆破伤害对轻型护甲单位攻击时的伤害倍率
BuffTooltip.Debuff_EnhancePierceRate: 降低贯通伤害对重型装甲单位攻击时的伤害倍率
BuffTooltip.Debuff_EnhanceMysticRate: 降低神秘伤害对特种装甲单位攻击时的伤害倍率
BuffTooltip.Debuff_EnhanceSonicRate: Decreases the damage bonus when dealing Sonic type attacks against Elastic Armor targets.
BuffTooltip.Debuff_EnhanceLightArmorRate: (暂定)提升护甲类型为轻型护甲时受到的伤害
BuffTooltip.Debuff_EnhanceHeavyArmorRate: (暂定)提升护甲类型为重型装甲时受到的伤害
BuffTooltip.Debuff_EnhanceUnarmedRate: (暂定)提升护甲类型为特种装甲时受到的伤害
BuffTooltip.Debuff_HealedLimit: 限制受到回复效果时的生命值最大回复量
BuffTooltip.Debuff_HealEffectiveness: 降低该目标受到回复效果时的生命值回复量
BuffTooltip.Debuff_HealPower: 降低回复效果的治疗量与护盾能吸收的伤害量
BuffTooltip.Debuff_Hieronymus: 对该目标造成持续伤害。若该状态在一定时间内未解除，则对该目标及其周围圆形范围内的敌方单位造成大量伤害。当该目标的的生命值为100%或回复至100%时该状态将自动解除
BuffTooltip.Debuff_HIT: 提升攻击被闪避的概率
BuffTooltip.Debuff_OppressionPower: 降低成功施加群控状态的概率
BuffTooltip.Debuff_OppressionResist: 提升被施加群控状态的概率
BuffTooltip.Debuff_Penetration: 降低攻击时无视目标防御力的量
BuffTooltip.Debuff_Poison: 以一定时间间隔受到中毒伤害(该伤害无法暴击)
BuffTooltip.Debuff_Stability: 降低攻击伤害随机波动区间的下限
BuffTooltip.CC_Fear:
无法控制，将慢慢远离对其施加该状态的单位/
技能将被打断
BuffTooltip.CC_Stunned:
无法行动/
技能将被打断
BuffTooltip.CC_Provoke:
无法控制，将强制攻击对其施加该状态的单位/
技能将被打断
BuffTooltip.CC_Paralysis:
无法行动/
技能将被打断
BuffTooltip.CC_Emp:
无法行动/
技能将被打断
BuffTooltip.Special_EnergyBatteryHalf:
提升爱丽丝EX技能和子技能的效果至1.5倍(半充能)/2倍(完全充能)
使用EX技能后能量清零
BuffTooltip.Special_Immortal: 状态持续期间受到致死伤害时保留至少1生命值
BuffTooltip.Special_ImmuneDamage: 免疫受到的部分种类或任何伤害
BuffTooltip.Special_Fury: 提升尼禄EX技能造成的伤害
BuffTooltip.Special_Misdeed: 基于持有数降低相应的防御力，阿露(正月)使用EX技能时将基于持有数获得技能COST
BuffTooltip.Special_LittleDevil: 基于持有数提升相应的暴击伤害，当持有数为6时将提升睦月(正月)普通技能造成的伤害
BuffTooltip.Special_Accumulation: 该状态持续期间对该目标造成的伤害量将以一定倍率蓄积，并在该状态结束后对该目标造成蓄积伤害量的伤害。
BuffTooltip.Special_SuddenDeath: 该目标被叠加5层印记时立即死亡
BuffTooltip.Special_Stamp: 心奈持有5个「花丸印章」时，降低除自身外所有我方单位1点EX技能费用，并回复自身生命值
BuffTooltip.Special_Holiday: 提升该角色特定EX技能的效果
BuffTooltip.Special_SilverBullet: 强化樱子的普通攻击，普通攻击时造成追加伤害(该追伤可触发子技能追伤)
BuffTooltip.Special_CH0187Mod:
提升时的攻击力、命中值和闪避值，并改变EX技能、普通技能和普通攻击的模式
使用3次EX技能后模式解除
BuffTooltip.Special_Omamori: 佳代子(正月)的子技能触发后，令持有该状态的我方单位加算神秘克制倍率
BuffTooltip.Special_Dado: 果穗攻击时造成追加伤害
BuffTooltip.Special_DebuffCountYellow: 受到的伤害和攻击力提升
BuffTooltip.Special_OldBook: 获得3个时发动忧(泳装)的基本技能
BuffTooltip.Special_CH0089_ExtraPassive: Deals additional damage to the target(s) of Kasumi's EX Skill when at 3 stacks.

ui.home_introduction: Schale 是 Nexon Games 开发，日服由 Yostar、国际服由 Nexon 运营的手游蔚蓝档案的非官方数据库。
ui.home_change_server: 请使用设置菜单 选择日服/国际服以显示对应服务器的内容。
ui.home_features_list:
• 全体学生及其技能、召唤物、战术支援载具的完整信息
  • 全面的数据计算，可以显示学生在任意星级、等级、装备、技能和增益状态下的面板数据
  • 完整的物品、装备和家具数据库
  • 所有关卡的掉落奖励、地图和详细的敌人信息
  • 总力战BOSS与合同火力演习的数据及技能信息
  • 查看从制造节点可能获取物品的概率
ui.home_footer_text:
